name: Stele
uniques: Destroyed when the city is captured
Hidden when religion is disabled

name: Krepost
uniques: [-25]% Culture cost of natural border growth [in this city]
[-25]% Gold cost of acquiring tiles [in this city]
New [Military] units start with [15] Experience [in this city]
Destroyed when the city is captured

name: Seehaus
uniques: Will not be displayed in Civilopedia
Doesn't need adjacency to coast
Required Tech Sailing vs Optics
[+1 Food] from [Ocean] tiles [in this city]
[+1 Food] from [Coast] tiles [in this city]
[+1 Food, +1 Culture] from [Lakes] tiles [in this city]
[+1 Food] from [Fish] tiles [in this city]

name: Quipu Library
uniques: Will not be displayed in Civilopedia
[+1 Science] per [2] population [in this city]
[+1 Culture] [in this city]<in cities with at least [4] [Population]>
[+1 Culture] [in this city] <in cities with at least [7] [Population]>
[+1 Culture] [in this city] <in cities with at least [10] [Population]>
Messengers sent to or from this city are immune to message interception
Free [Archer] appears
Unsellable

civilopediaText.text: One of the most unique writting sistems, if you could call it that. The Quipus transmit information via a code of knots in some strings, and this sistem would be kept secret, making critical information difficult for enemies to decifer.

name: Charity Center
uniques: Will not be displayed in Civilopedia
Required Tech Calendar vs Construction
[+1 Production] [in this city] <after discovering [Philosophy]>

name: Sailors of Pride
uniques: Will not be displayed in Civilopedia
Enables embarkation for land units <starting from the [Ancient era]>
Enables [Trireme] units to enter ocean tiles <after discovering [Optics]>
Enables [Settler] units to enter ocean tiles <after discovering [Optics]>
[+1] Movement <for [Settler] units>

name: Path of Incandalo
uniques: Will not be displayed in Civilopedia
[Scout] units gain the [Scouting II] promotion
[Civilian] units gain the [Ignore terrain cost] promotion

name: Indian Fortification
uniques: Will not be displayed in Civilopedia
[+1 Culture, +1 Production] from every [Fort]
[+1 Gold, +1 Production] from every [Walls]
[+2 Gold, +2 Production] from every [Great Wall]
[+2 Culture] from every [Castle]
[+1 Gold, +1 Culture] from every [Fort] <after discovering [Flight]>

name: Underground Workforce
uniques: Will not be displayed in Civilopedia
[+1 Culture] from every [Mine]
[+1 Culture] from every [Mine] <starting from the [Medieval era]>
[+1 Culture] from every [Mine] <starting from the [Industrial era]>

name: Wisp Summoning
uniques: [5] free random researchable Tech(s) from the [Ancient era]

name: Wisp Summoning 2
uniques: [2] free random researchable Tech(s) from the [Classical era]
Only available <in cities with a [Wisp Summoning]>

name: Deploy the Colossus
uniques: Automatically built in all cities where it is buildable
Only available <in cities with a [Palace]>
Free [Giant Niiponi] appears

name: Bread and Circuses
uniques: [+25]% Production when constructing [Happiness] buildings [in all cities]

civilopediaText.text: Oh great Ceasar! Our citizens are unhappy! Let us organise some grand games, with bull fighting, gladiator fights and feasts for everyone! That will cheer up the masses, and avoid rebellion.

name: Alemanni Confederation
uniques: +30% Strength when fighting City-State units and cities
[+1] Movement <for [Sword] units>
[+30]% [Production] [in puppeted cities]

civilopediaText.text: Alone we stand to weake to this great foe from the South, oh leader! Let us unite with smaller tribes close to us, and fight the invader together!

name: Boulangerie
uniques: [+1 Food] from [Wheat] tiles [in this city]

civilopediaText.text: A boulangerie is a French bakery. As opposed to a p√¢tisserie, they must bake their bread on-premises to hold the title of 'boulangerie' in France. They bake a great variety of products, their most famous one being the 'baguette'.

name: Olive Press
uniques: [+1 Production, +1 Food] from [Oils] tiles [in this city]

civilopediaText.text: The olive press is the place where brought to to be turned into olive oil. Several designes have been used throughout history, the most common type used in the classical era consisted of large cilindrical mounted by an upper milling stone, usually powered by an animal, used to grind the olives and their pits into a pulp.

name: Zulia Ababa University
uniques: When declaring friendship, both parties gain a [20]% boost to great person generation
Allied City-States provide [Science] equal to [20]% of what they produce for themselves
Can only be built [in capital]
Requires a [Library] in all cities
Cost increases by [30] per owned city

civilopediaText.text: A prestigious university in the center of Zulia Ababa, known for it's numerous international exchange programs.

civilopediaText.name: Traditional Kingdom
uniques: Will not be displayed in Civilopedia
Automatically built in all cities where it is buildable
[+15]% Production when constructing [Culture] wonders [in capital]
[3] units cost no maintenance
[+1 Culture] from every [Walls]
[+1 Gold, +1 Culture] from each Trade Route
Only available <for [Traditional Kingdom]> <in cities with a [Palace]> <in cities without a [Classification]>
Destroyed when the city is captured
Classification
